Dwight McCarthy.action: Frank struggles and fails to get his false head free when it gets wedged between two branches.
Dwight McCarthy.assessment: This action suggests a momentary lack of physical control or situational awareness, indicating a lapse in practical competence in a survival or escape scenario.

Dwight McCarthy.action: Frank nervously hands over his change when asked for money and admits he has no cashpoint card.
Dwight McCarthy.assessment: This indicates poor preparation and lack of resourcefulness, reflecting negatively on his competence in managing practical necessities during a crisis.

Dwight McCarthy.action: Frank uses nervous over-politeness to ask to go to the toilet and then scurries away frantically.
Dwight McCarthy.assessment: This shows some quick thinking and an attempt to create an opportunity to act independently, which is a positive indicator of competence, though the nervousness tempers confidence.
